pageContext.claim: “Funny to see Corrupt Joe Biden reading a statement on Russia, which was obviously written by his handlers. Russia ate his and Obama’s lunch during their time in office, so badly that Obama wanted them out of the then G-8. U.S. was weak on everything, but especially Russia!”
pageContext.analysis: This is an absurd way to recall recent history. Russia invaded Crimea, a part of Ukraine, sparking outrage in the West, and the other seven G-8 member nations acted in concert to expel Russia from the group in 2014. Trump repeatedly claims that "Putin took Crimea from Obama," and this remark about Obama throwing a tantrum and getting the other members of the G-8 to drop Russia is a version of the same tortured logic.
